creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
Include Wyona in the automatic builds of the Apache Jakarta Gump process 
(http://jakarta.apache.org/gump/).

A module data definition file gump.xml in the Wyona cvs repository seems to be 
the only missing presupposition.


------- Additional Comments From Andreas Kuckartz 2003-01-06 06:44 -------

A repository data definition for Wyona was added to the Gump cvs-repository a 
few hours ago:

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs/jakarta-gump/repository/wyona.xml

This can now be referenced by a module data definition.


------- Additional Comments From Gregor J. Rothfuss 2003-04-28 16:41 -------

gump.xml done, waiting on a volunteer to take it further

creator: egli@apache.org
text: According to the old bugzilla this was a 1.2 item.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
"bodewig" and "stefano" seem to be working on this.

See:
http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/gump/project/lenya.xml

the ever-elusive gump integration requires cocoon to build on gump first..
therefore not 1.2.1 material unfortunately.
creator: gregor@apache.org
